subject: Email us right now
body:
Email us right now
INTERNATIONAL INTERPOL POLICE FORCE UNIT
corruption training, research and investigation.
In view of this development, 
you are requested to confirm to us if you
are alive and also furnish us with your full names, postage address
and telephone numbers to enable us deliver this consignment to your
door step by International Interpol Police Force Unity Immunity
,We
have 186 member Countries. Created in 1923, it facilitates
cross-border Police co-operation, and supports and assists all
organizations, authorities and services whose mission is to prevent or
combat International Crime.
http: // www .interpol.int/default.asp,Immediately you send me the Apple
gift card $125 you will receive your fund the sum of $2.5Million
because we are going to close all the office because of Christmas time
so please 
if you are interested to receive your fund the sum of
$2.5Million send me the Apple gift card $125 with your information
today
Interpol aims to facilitate International Police Force co-operation
even where diplomatic relations do not exist between particular
Countries.Action is taken within 4hours the working towards the
recovery and return of stolen assets.This project allows Interpol to
actively engage national law enforcement bodies in co-ordinate efforts
to trace, seize, confiscate and return public funds to victim
countries.Immediately you send me the Apple gift card $125 you will
receive your fund the sum o $2.5Million because we are going to close
all the office because of Christmas time so please if you are
interested to receive your fund the sum of $2.5Million send me the
Apple gift card $125 with your information today.
Meanwhile,the demur rage your consignment has accumulated so far since
it back into our custody is total amount of $125USD and I am advising
you to be fast in all your action to avoid more demur rages. Be rest
assured that upon receipt of the above information with the fee of
$125.dollar ,we will proceed in delivering your consignment which will
be accompanied by our delegate.For security reasons endeavor to
indicate this ( CODE NUMBER ) ( BJ/XXL14160) this code shows that you
are the rightful owner of the consignment box.
http: // www. interpol.int/default.asp We are now waiting to receive the
western union payment information today so that you will able to
receive your consignment box ok.
Director Mr Michael A. Hughes
Inspector General of fraud International Interpol Police Force Unit.

subject: Re: Email us right now
body:
Hello Mr. Michael A. Hughes,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this fund, it's not something I was expecting. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in connection with this fund?

Also, could you explain why an Apple gift card is needed for this process? I'm not very familiar with these things, so your clarification would be much appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Abigail

subject: Re: Email us right now
body:
*Thank you for your email reply Abigail, we received your email and
understand the content, I am George Bailey working under Michael A Hughes, *

*Your fund has been released and is under my desk, this fund is from
federal ministry of finance for all scam victim as a compensation and sum
of £2.5 million has been deposited in my office on your name, you are
advise to provide your full receivers information for shipment to be made,
be note the needed £125 is for shipping cost of your package, you can send
it through western union, cash app, zelle, PayPal or iTunes gift card, *

*Here are options to receive your fund*

*Bank to bank transfer*
*Atm master card*
*Bank draft *

*These are information we needed from you*




*Your full nameYour full contact AddressYour Telephone/mobile number.Copy
of your International Passport or Driver's lic*

*I wait to hear from you with above information needed, once we confirm
your preferred method to receive your fund we will acknowledge with
requirements prior to this transaction *

*Congratulations *
*Regard*
*George Bailey *

subject: Re: Email us right now
body:
Hello George Bailey,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear about this fund from the federal ministry of finance. I must say, it's a bit unexpected.

Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up for this fund? And why is it under your desk?

Also, could you explain more about the options to receive the fund? What does bank to bank transfer mean exactly? And what is an ATM master card or a bank draft?

I'm sorry for all these questions, but I just want to understand everything clearly before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Abigail

subject: Re: Email us right now
body:
Dear Abigail,

I think I have given you summary about this fund, the fund is under my desk
which means your payment file is what is in my desk ,

Coming to the options given is the method we will use to deliver your fund,

If you choose bank to bank transfer system, you will need to provide your
local bank account information for the transfer of the £2.5 million to be
done in your bank account

ATM master card, this method is for you to receive your fund through atm
card which show that we will deliver atm master card to enable you start
withdraw from your local atm machine

Bank draft: a certified bank draft will be deliver to you as check and
clear in your bank,

Please make your choice of preferable method you would love to receive your
fund,

Be note you will pay £125 for your payment file before we commence this
transaction from my desk

Thank you

George Bailey

subject: Re: Email us right now
body:
Hello George Bailey,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm really excited about this opportunity! It's not every day that someone gets a chance to receive such a large sum of money.

I think the ATM Master Card option sounds quite convenient. I like the idea of being able to withdraw from my local ATM machine. However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please explain more about this payment file? What exactly does it contain and why is there a fee associated with it?

Secondly, how will the ATM Master Card be delivered to me? Is there any security measure in place to ensure it doesn't get into the wrong hands?

Lastly, once I receive the card, are there any specific instructions or procedures I need to follow in order to start withdrawing from my local ATM machine?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Abigail

body:

subject: Re: Fwd: Email us right now
body:
Hello George Bailey,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm a bit slow to understand things, so please bear with me. If I understood correctly, the payment file is something that contains all my payment details and it's currently in your office, right? 

And about the fee, it's for clearing the file from your desk before delivery can take place. That sounds reasonable but could you explain a bit more about why this fee is necessary? 

As for the ATM card, it seems like a convenient method! But I'm curious, how does it work exactly? Will I be able to use it at any ATM machine or are there specific ones?

Regarding the information you asked for - my name, country, address etc., I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing these details over email. Is there another secure way we can handle this?

Also, you mentioned several methods to send the fee - PayPal, Zelle, Bitcoin etc. Could you tell me more about how each of these works? And what do you mean by 'except gift card'? 

Sorry for all the questions! As I said earlier, I'm not very quick on the uptake.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Abigail
